name: run-this
description: A rust utility that gracefully handles missing command dependencies

scripts.build:release: bun lint && bun format && cargo build --release
scripts.setup: bun run build:release && bun run install
scripts.tag: git tag -a v${npm_package_version} -m 'v${npm_package_version}' && git push origin v${npm_package_version}
scripts.tag:main: git tag -a v${npm_package_version} -m 'v${npm_package_version}' && git push main v${npm_package_version}
